plot: Said to be based on fact, the residents of new houses experience disturbing supernatural phenomena. They find out that their houses are built on land formerly used as a cemetery.
title: Grave Secrets: The Legacy of Hilltop Drive

original_name: Grave Secrets: The Legacy of Hilltop Drive
